"Rossa": "Hey, uhh... You can hear me, right? ...That place is apparently some mysterious area that someone must've created."
"We hardly know anything about the place, but we're detecting some huge energy readings coming from it. The higher ups figure it ain't somethin' we can just ignore."
"We've also got reports of some unidentified enemies in that area, so... J-Just be real careful in there, alright?"
